aagamika sahithyamaya ha sanskruthika washayen agana “ma dutu peradiga bauddha siddhasthana”, “shri saranathissa pujopahara”, “siri sudasun wehera waruna hewath sambudu siritha (pada)”, “sadaham kadapatha”, “charithra warithra wakraya” menma “sinhala bhasha sahithyaye wikashanaya” nam wu paryeshana granthayak da unwahansege thelithudin patakayanta dayada kerini.

nuwarawal wisi dekak saha eewaye gamda thibuneya. 31aasher puthrayange pawulwala hatiyata owunge gothraye urumaya meki nuwarawal saha eewaye gamya. 32saweni kotasa napthali puthrayanta eseya, napthalige puthrayanta owunge pawulwala hatiyata watuneya. 33owunge simawa helephi sita shanan nimhi thibuna alona wrukshaya patan adami-nekebda yabneyelda lakkumda dakwa gos, yordana langa kelawara wuneya. 34ethanin simawa basnahirata hari asnoth-thaborta gos, ethanin hukokta pamina, dakunen sabulonda basnahiren aasherda nagenahiren yordane yudayada dakwa giyeya. 35pawuru athi nuwarawal nam: shiddimda sherda hammathda rakkathda kinnerethda, 36adamada ramada hashorda, 37kedeshda edreyida een-hashorda, 38ironda migdal-yelda horemda beth-anathda beth-shemeshda yana mewaya; nuwarawal dahanawayak saha eewaye gamda thibuneya. 39napthalige pawulwala hatiyata owunge gothraye urumaya meki nuwarawal saha eewaye gamya. 40sathweni kotasa dan puthrayange gothrayata owunge pawulwala hatiyata watuneya. 41owunge urumaye palatha nam shorada eshthayolda eer-shemeshda, 42shalabbinda aayalonda ithlada, 43eelonda thimnada ekronda, 44elthekeda gibbethonda balathda, 45yehudda bene-berakda gath-rimmonda, 46me-yarkonda yoppawa idiripita thibena palatha athuluwa rakkonda yana mewaya. 47dan puthrayange palatha owunta madiwa thibuna nisa owhu gos leshemta wiruddhawa yuddhakota eya alwagena eeta kadu muwahathin paharadi eya himikaragena, ehi wasaya kota, owunge piyawu dange nama prakara leshemta dan yana nama thabuwoya. 48dan puthrayange pawulwala hatiyata owunge gothraye urumaya meki nuwarawal saha eewaye gamya. 49mese uruma pinisa sima washayen deshaya bedadi nimakota ishrayel puthrayo nunge puthrawu yoshuwata thamun atharehi urumayak dunnoya. 50ohu illu nuwara wana eprayim kandu ratehi thibena thimnath-sera owhu swaminwahansege aagnyawa prakara ohuta dunnoya.
